summary:
ZAAK LIIR ENB is back with the support of the 0.292 binaries.
When realism and dark fantasy merge into one single cinematic enb...
--- THE BEST CINEMATIC ENB ---
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=silver]




LaBeatBeatbox[/color][color=silver]







presents



[/color][/center][center][/center][center][color=silver]Z A A K   L I I R  E N B   V . 4 . 5    / / / E V O L V E D  _  F X

P  E  R  F  E  C  T  I  O  N     A  N  D     I  M  M  E  R  S  I  O  N

[font=Times New Roman]






a.k.a. "the best enb ever made"

___________________________________________________

this enb is featured on

" 4 S K Y R I M "

[url=http://4skyrim.com/zaak-liir-enb-mod-for-skyrim/]
LINK[/url]
_______________________________________________________






This enb is has reached its final release. 
Updates will only include optional files with different presets.

With new and fresh Ideas for my next enb, I am 
glad to release the absolute [b][u]final version[/u][/b] of this mod.








[img]http://static-5.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/67548-0-1439919566.jpg[/img]





I am no creator of generic enbs with oversaturated colors, or blinding daylights you get tired of  within five minutes.
I try my best to create enbs that do not only look good for beeing thrown away
the next moment, but I try to create enbs that remain enjoyable even for a long period of time.
As a semi-realistic enb, it will   N O T   look like real life, as you see the world with your own eyes. Instead, shadows, reflections and lights
will show a realistic behavior. The "not realistic" part is done by the additional shaders, color curves and
the dark color palette ( like the post processing they do in the movies ).


This enb is designed for both high quality screenarchery and gameplay experience. While giving a somehow relaxing
and soothing mood on sunny days, thunderstorms and other "dark" weathers will have a unique sinister feel to them - creating
an extremely immersive atmosphere.






[youtube]w0ATwBbvuxM[/youtube]       [youtube]FkG3wWJrmY4[/youtube]

[youtube]nsfgilAmzK4[/youtube]

[youtube]E71_8VgchNI[/youtube]


Thanks to


S U P R E M E x H D

L I Z A R D R E X 

F A N T A S T I K L U L U

WGPERI




I double-checked every single change I did to this enb, considered different locations and weathers; and this is

the most finetuned and immersive enb ever created. You will never experience any visual conflict ( even eleminating 

errors bethesda did themselves - like too bright mountain-surrounding clouds

beeing a lot brighter than the skybox at thunderstorms / overcast weather ). Any changes will either 

include further improvements to the weather system or be of artistic nature ( like increase or decrease of saturation ).





[img]http://static-5.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/67548-3-1439919565.jpg[/img]





______________________________________________________

Y O U R   C O M M E N T S   O N   T H I S   E N B
______________________________________________________


"This ENB has an excellent atmosphere - allows for great screenshots.. and performance hit is not that big, good work!"
- Dammal19 -


"I don't know what kind of magic you performed to get this kind of performance, but I have jumped up 15 more fps and it still looks fantastic"
- Dahveed -


"Great Job! This is my new favorite ENB preset, nothing to complain about, which is my specialty"
- stanleemojo -


"I'm a big fan of BLEAK ENB, so this one here looks like it could be my taste... will give this a go soon"
- JanT83 -


"I'm impressed with the visuals, the cinematic feeling and I'm also having wonderful performance with your preset, really appreciated your effort. 
So far, this is my favorite ENB and I love the style. Thank you!"
- wgperi -

"You can't have a Dark Fantasy playthrough without this ENB Preset! Absolutely Endorsed!!!"
- XanatosVonFiction -
______________________________________________________







Zaak Liir enb is back with numerous effects added to it, support of the 0.279 binaries and

will bring stunning cinematic visuals to your screen like no other enb preset ever did before.

My utmost concern was to prevent a "graphics overdose". Yet I tried to use as many effects as possible. 

The result of months of careful finetuning is what makes this enb look the greatest in any condition - no matter the place nor the weather,

stunning and flawless graphics are garanteed.









[img]http://static-5.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/67548-2-1439919566.jpg[/img]




T H I S   E N B   F E A T U R E S



customised bloom shader

Realistic Lens flare shading - rendering the fake "sunglare" obsolete

High quality Performance friendly bokeh depth of field effect

cinematic color ( de- ) saturation and HDR tone mapping curve

lens dirt effect ( optional )

TRU CINEMA letterbox ( 26 % - 1920 x 799.2 soft border transition )

color dispersion (like an old technicolor movie, but more subtle)

two sperate sharpening samplers

sub pixel blur shading ( softens the image without the loss of quality )

 High Definition Ambient Occlusion

light exposure adaption




[img]http://static-5.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/67548-1-1439919566.jpg[/img]




[/font][/color]
[color=silver][font=Times New Roman]This enb started as a concept art for a bloom shader.

I kept adding more and more to the enb. And over time, 

more and more color came in, almost losing its original style. So in this last installment, I will take 

Zaak Liir enb back to its roots - since this enb was originally meant as 

DARK CINEMATIC, not bright and colorful.









________________________________________________________


If you like this enb, please endorse

these are mods I personally enjoy while playing, enhancing the gameplay without
overhauling the game too much.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39912/?]Big Bump Roads[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56665/?]DOWNPOUR[/url]

[img]http://static-6.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/67548-0-1439919968.jpg[/img]
[/font]



T H I S   E N B   W O R K S   P R O P E R L Y   W I T H   0 . 2 7 9   B I N A R I E S

0 . 2 9 2   B I N A R I E S   A R E   S U P P O R T E D   A S   W E L L


If you run the 0.292 binaries make sure you use the new enblocal as well as the new enbhost,
so you will not have to deal with any troubles regarding the binary version.


bfloatrendertarget=0 must be set to 1 in the skyrimprefs.ini and you probably
need to change the "videomemorysizeMB" in the enblocal (your VRAM (mb) + RAM (mb) - 2048)
and this enb requires enbhelper available [/color][color=silver][url=http://www.dev-c.com/skyrim/enbhelper/]HERE[/url].[/color][color=silver]

ENB Particle patch is highly recommended, I would say its almost required
(available at enbdev.com)
As well as any mod to remove interior fog ( thanks to Subdouille for reminding me XD )


If your PC cant handle the newer binaries you can allways check out the previous version of this mod available [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65151/?]HERE[/url].
Said version also covers letterbox related issues due to SHD resolution displays






[/color][/center]
author: LaBeatBeatbox
